name: 柯明村
objective:
介紹空調系統節能的理論與實用技術。內容包括：空調元件能源秏損分析，系統搭配之操作性能及總體熱效率評估，耗能因素改善方法與技術，節能設備之原理與設計技術。
The course is prepared for the theory and technology of ventilation energy conservation. The topics are: energy loss analysis of system components, survey of system cop and overall efficiency, improving methods and technology, and the fundamentals and design technology of energy conservation devices.
schedule:
1. 日常節能指標
    (1)「綠建築」簡介
    (2) ENVLOAD 簡介
    (3) EEV, EAC 與 EL 簡介
    (4) 計算步驟與實例
2. Energy Savings Techniques (Chap. 2)
3. Engineering Calculations (Chap. 6)
4. Reduce Heating and Cooling Loads (Chap. 10)
5. Reduce Flows and Resistance (Sec. 6)
6. HVAC System Conversions (Sec. 7)
7. Heating and Cooling Equipment (Sec. 9)
8. HVAC Units and Air Distribution Equipment (Sec. 10)
9. Ductwork, Piping and Insulation (Sec. 11)
10. Presentations and Discussions on Special Topics
scorePolicy:
